name: Murky Hollows
description:
You are lost in a dark, damp cavern where you cannot rely on your sight. You must rely on your other senses to get around the cavern and deal with the creatures inside.

This game was made for the Dungeon Crawler Game 2023.

Theme: Duality - In this game, you can only rely on two of your senses: hearing and touch.

Controls

Use WASD/Arrows to move

Z/Space - Echolocation

X/Ctrl - Touch/Feel

Credits

Ypsilon - Programming

Daniel-Imbert - Audio, Implementation
